description: Returns a list of the monitoring evaluation results and predictor events collected by the monitor resource during different windows of time. For information about monitoring see  predictor-monitoring. For more information about retrieving monitoring results see Viewing Monitoring Results.

parameters.name: MonitorArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the monitor resource to get results from.

parameters.name: Filters
parameters.description: An array of filters. For each filter, provide a condition and a match statement. The condition is either IS or IS_NOT, which specifies whether to include or exclude the resources that match the statement from the list. The match statement consists of a key and a value. Condition - The condition to apply. Valid values are IS and IS_NOT. Key - The name of the parameter to filter on. The only valid value is EvaluationState. Value - The value to match. Valid values are only SUCCESS or FAILURE. For example, to list only successful monitor evaluations, you would specify: "Filters": [ { "Condition": "IS", "Key": "EvaluationState", "Value": "SUCCESS" } ] (dict) --- Describes a filter for choosing a subset of objects. Each filter consists of a condition and a match statement. The condition is either IS or IS_NOT, which specifies whether to include or exclude the objects that match the statement, respectively. The name of the parameter to filter on. The value to match. The condition to apply. To include the objects that match the statement, specify IS. To exclude matching objects, specify IS_NOT.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: If the response is truncated, Amazon Forecast returns this token. To retrieve the next set of results, use the token in the next request. Tokens expire after 24 hours.

nested_items.name: PredictorMonitorEvaluations
nested_items.description: The monitoring results and predictor events collected by the monitor resource during different windows of time.

nested_items.name: ResourceArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the resource to monitor.

nested_items.name: MonitorArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the monitor resource.

nested_items.name: EvaluationTime
nested_items.description: The timestamp that indicates when the monitor evaluation was started.

nested_items.name: EvaluationState
nested_items.description: The status of the monitor evaluation. The state can be SUCCESS or FAILURE.

nested_items.name: WindowStartDatetime
nested_items.description: The timestamp that indicates the start of the window that is used for monitor evaluation.

nested_items.name: WindowEndDatetime
nested_items.description: The timestamp that indicates the end of the window that is used for monitor evaluation.

nested_items.name: PredictorEvent
nested_items.description: Provides details about a predictor event, such as a retraining.

nested_items.name: Detail
nested_items.description: The type of event. For example, Retrain. A retraining event denotes the timepoint when a predictor was retrained. Any monitor results from before the Datetime are from the previous predictor. Any new metrics are for the newly retrained predictor.

nested_items.name: Datetime
nested_items.description: The timestamp for when the event occurred.

nested_items.name: MonitorDataSource
nested_items.description: The source of the data the monitor resource used during the evaluation.

nested_items.name: DatasetImportJobArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the dataset import job used to import the data that initiated the monitor evaluation.

nested_items.name: ForecastArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the forecast the monitor used during the evaluation.

nested_items.name: PredictorArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the predictor resource you are monitoring.

nested_items.name: MetricResults
nested_items.description: A list of metrics Forecast calculated when monitoring a predictor. You can compare the value for each metric in the list to the metric's value in the  Baseline to see how your predictor's performance is changing.

nested_items.name: MetricName
nested_items.description: The name of the metric.

nested_items.name: MetricValue
nested_items.description: The value for the metric.

nested_items.name: NumItemsEvaluated
nested_items.description: The number of items considered during the evaluation.

nested_items.name: Message
nested_items.description: Information about any errors that may have occurred during the monitor evaluation.
